Security Service API Documentation
==================================

This document provides an overview of the **Security Service API**.

.. automodule:: security_service
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Classes and Methods
==================

AuditLogsAPI Class
------------------

The **AuditLogsAPI** class handles the retrieval and logging of audit logs.

.. autoclass:: security_service.AuditLogsAPI
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

SecureKeysAPI Class
-------------------

The **SecureKeysAPI** class handles storing and retrieving secure keys.

.. autoclass:: security_service.SecureKeysAPI
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
